price: 93. Kinnih immay kaadu Sinam diinil itta wayteeh baxambaxsimteeh butta butta yekken, usun inkih Qhiyaamah ayro cisab kee galtoh nee fanah gacelon iyye Yalli.
arabic: وَتَقَطَّعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُم بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلٌّ إِلَيۡنَا رَٰجِعُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wataqaṭṭaʿū amrahum baynahum kullun ilaynā rājiʿūna
